title: More on the movie: I’m Not Jesus Mommy
post: I just saw the film.  I watched it because I found the concept interesting.  The film was ok.  It could have explained things a little better.  I would have enjoyed it more if it delved deeper into what happened to the world after the cloned boy was born.  The acting was good though.  I didn’t feel like I wasted my time watching it.
author: Cher
